<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157048</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157048</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2552</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Annenberg Channel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Annenberg Führung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Manche d'Annenberg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Canaleta De Annenberg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Manica Di Annenberg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κανάλι Annenberg</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Canal De Annenberg</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Annenberg Channel is a free satellite channel for schools which includes videos from various content areas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">social studies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">histoty</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Annenberg Führung ist eine freie 
Satellitenführung für Schulen, die videos von den verschiedenen 
zufriedenen Bereichen enthält.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Manche d'Annenberg est un canal satellite 
libre pour des écoles qui inclut des videos de diverses zones 
contentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A canaleta de Annenberg é uma canaleta satellite
livre para escolas que inclua videos das várias áreas satisfeitas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Manica di Annenberg è una scanalatura 
satellite libera per le scuole che include i videos dalle varie zone 
soddisfatte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κανάλι Annenberg είναι ένα ελεύθερο δορυφορικό 
κανάλι για τα σχολεία που περιλαμβάνει τα βίντεο από τις 
διάφορες ικανοποιημένες περιοχές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El canal de Annenberg es un canal basado en los 
satélites libre para las escuelas que incluye videos de varias áreas
contentas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialstudien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">histoty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la science</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">études sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ciência</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estudos sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">histoty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">scienza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">studi sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">histoty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιστήμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κοινωνικές μελέτες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">histoty</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ciencia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estudios sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">histoty</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

version:3.0

version:3.0

          <typicalAgeRange>

          <context>

          <taxonPath>
